game.title: The Lost City
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact in the lost city
game.description: Legend has it that an ancient civilization once thrived in a city deep within the nearby jungle. The city is said to contain a powerful artifact, but many have attempted to find it and never returned.
game.reward: 10,000 gold coins and the title of 'Archaeologist Extraordinaire'

tasks.objective: Gather information about the lost city
tasks.description: Speak to Professor Thistlewaite's research assistant, Timmy, who has been studying the ancient texts.

tasks.objective: Explore the jungle and find the entrance to the lost city
tasks.description: Make your way through the dense foliage and navigate through the winding paths. Be careful of the wild beasts and treacherous terrain.

tasks.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the heart of the lost city
tasks.description: Make your way through the ancient ruins, avoiding deadly traps and puzzles. The artifact is said to be hidden deep within the city's central pyramid.
